name: Igknight Paladin
desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ] 
[ Monster Effect ] ''This Igknight has a reputation as a thinker with a cool head. But the truth is that his emotions just take longer to heat up.''
pend_desc: If you have an "Igknight" card in your other Pendulum Zone: You can destroy both cards in your Pendulum Zones, and if you do, add 1 FIRE Warrior-Type monster from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.
monster_desc: ''This Igknight has a reputation as a thinker with a cool head. But the truth is that his emotions just take longer to heat up.''
